text:
MICHIGAN STATE UNIVERSITY east lansing
* v
COLLEGE OF COMMUNICATION ARTS • DIVISION OF MASS COMMUNICATIONS • DEPARTMENT OF TELEVISION, RADIO & FILM
February 19, 1962
Mr* Harold E. Hill
NAEB Headquarters
131*6 Connecticut Ave, NW
Washington 6, DC
Dear Harold,
Can you tell me what the spring Board meeting dates are this year? I’ve
probably got them somewhere; but I’m blessed if I know where. And I’ve
got to get plans made.
Another thing: I can’t for the life of me remember whether the NAEB
pays Board member expenses for the meetings. Travel money was never
a problem when I worked for Ken Bartlett (as I did when I was last oh
the BoardjL But it is herei (Mind you, it’s not on account of any-
alleged troubles on the part of the Sovereign State of Michigan, but
simply because MSU is one of those State Universities.) Can you
straighten me out?
